column3: “I've been a heavy daily  smoker for about 7 months ( I treat PTSD and back disc pain with it),  I'd been in a bit of a high slump, and wasn't getting the euphoria hardly at all anymore.  Two bong hits of this and I literally put my head back and blasted off.  It took me to a beautiful place Spiritually,  and melted all my back pain away with waves of bliss and comfort.  Highly Recommend!”

“I grew 4 out of 12 they all popped. Had one girl. They were very short very Indica like leave and structure did not get over 4 feet but very thick stalks and  had many bud sites at least with nutes I was using And it's has like it says a blueberry skunk on inhale and a sour like grape on exhale real tasty and the medical side its awesome cause it has high CBD and high THC can't ask for anything better..”
“Amazing strain! Tastes sweet and has a very high THC percentage. Rated 3rd best strain in 2014 in the High Times magazine!!”
“Loved this strain for my insomnia and PTSD. Good for chronic pain relief  and stress.”

“Best in class indica, 17 a gram ( steep) but this has given me the best body high ever. Highly recommended for any sort of athletic pain / strain

Moderate dose: Powerful, intense, the body high with this one is next level. Charges your body like an angry ox, suddenly hitting you with an extreme body that you will not see coming. Kept me happy and relaxed for a while too 10/10
High dose: Put me to sleep like a baby. ...”

“Hello I'm from herban Legendz we are the farmers responsible for popping the particular pheno of Grape OX that placed best indica at the cannabis cup we've been doing this a long time and this is by far some of the best herb we've ever seen let alone had the privilege to cultivate. You can try it too but don't be fooled by other stores claiming they have the real deal its exclusively at Lindzy's in Flint, MI”
“Very tasty, berry/grape flavor, smooth uptake + exhale. Definitive stress/pain relief, calm—altho gave only 4 of 5 stars bc lacked any real euphoria..”
“Great for insomnia and anxiety very relaxing body high”
“Very tasty, berry/grape flavor, smooth uptake + exhale. Definitive stress/pain relief, calm—altho gave only 4 of 5 stars bc lacked any real euphoria..”
“Delicious grape flavor, really relaxing buzz, yeah 🎶🎶🎶...”
“If sleep or anxiety is an issue for you than this is the strain to pick it knocks you out no worries and sleep is something I don't do well but I do with this strain.”
“Super strong indica! Great for bedtime use and relaxation.”
“great for distressing at the end of the day. helps with my anxiety and sleep issues. does give me dry mouth often though.”
“smooth and relaxing strain. effects last long and is really great before bed.”

“Very tasty strain with a strong Grape aroma! Gave me some paranoia and a heavy headache, though it helped my insomnia and depression. I would say that the headachey feel might be an attribute of the THC content, but don't let that deter you from this strain!”

“Looks: Darker color than I usually like from concentrates, but given the genetics and how purple the flowers were I guess it's to be expected. Thick sugary goo consistency and was easy to get dabs off the gram. Good clarity as well.
Smell: Spicy, sandalwood, grapes, berries, musky coffee smell and sweet almost grassy smell. Very unique. 
Taste: Low temp tastes like grape ape and a subtle coffee flavor a lot more of t...”
“Amazing strain! Really strong and tastes amazing.”
“very relaxing body feeling”
“Great for chronic pain and insomnia.”
“This strain is an amazing night time bud. Takes my stress and depression away and allows me to have a full, easy sleep.”
“enjoyed alot at night times mostly”
“very purple nice body high”
“This for me was a very happy and mellow, but not slept”
“excellent de-stresser, calming heaviness behind the eyes, didn't put me to sleep but kept me sleeping sound through the night. great flavor”

“This is a nice relaxing strain. I don't find that it helps me sleep, but it does help with destimulating me. It's smooth on the throat, and I've had better results when using a bowl with this strain.”
“fabulous for nighttime, helps to relax, let go, and get some good rest. not quite a 5 star though, simply because it doesn't quite get there with the euphoria.”

“The fruity taste was very refreshing. It had a very strong grape aftertaste as the name would suggest. I had me couch locked almost instantly, and give me a mellow cerebral high. I recommend this strain to anyone looking for help sleeping or simply relaxing.”
“Excellent for insomnia - knocks me out in about half an hour. Definitely not euphoric but relaxing and helpful for anxiety/depression. Also relives mild aches and pains.”
“Beautiful buds. Excellent for insomnia. A little goes a long way.”
“Great taste with an amazing high👌🏾”
“Made me hungry and tired, very relaxed”
“Has very nice body high, messages your brain, along with subtle medicinal effects. Not a hard hitting strain.”
